attributes.action: recommend the removal of the O.B.E. honour from Mr. Jonathan Ross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Ross' recent appalling, bullying behaviour has brought both the BBC and the honour he holds into disrepute. Many British citizens are dismayed at the thought that he might be seen as representative of their views and moral compass. He is not worthy to hold such an honour which is founded on service to others and leadership by example.

rejection.details: Concerns about Honours should be addressed to the Honours and Appointments Secretariat, Ground Floor, Admiralty Arch, London SW1A 2WH or see www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
